definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale

sentences.english: Applying the concept of the solid angle , this paper generally demonstrates the Ampere circuit rule.
sentences.chinese: 本文應用立體角的概念，一般地證明了安培環路定理。
